config_files.abixen-platform-core/src/main/docker/Doc:
FROM openjdk:8-jre
VOLUME /tmp
ADD abixen-platform-core.jar app.jar

ENTRYPOINT ["java","-Djava.security.egd=file:/dev/./urandom","-Dspring.profiles.active=docker","-Dabixen.services.eureka.uri=discovery"]
CMD ["-jar","/app.jar"]

static_files.abixen-platform-core/src/main/resources/:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ehcache xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
         xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation="ehcache.xsd"
         updateCheck="true" monitoring="autodetect" dynamicConfig="true">
    <cache name="APPLICATION_LAYOUTS"
           maxEntriesLocalHeap="5000"
           maxEntriesLocalDisk="1000"
           eternal="false"
           diskSpoolBufferSizeMB="20"
           timeToIdleSeconds="200"
           timeToLiveSeconds="500"
           memoryStoreEvictionPolicy="LFU"
           transactionalMode="off" logging="true">
        <persistence strategy="localTempSwap"/>
    </cache>
    <cache name="APPLICATION_PAGES"
           maxEntriesLocalHeap="5000"
           maxEntriesLocalDisk="1000"
           eternal="false"
           diskSpoolBufferSizeMB="20"
           timeToIdleSeconds="200"
           timeToLiveSeconds="500"
           memoryStoreEvictionPolicy="LFU"
           transactionalMode="off" logging="true">
        <persistence strategy="localTempSwap"/>
    </cache>
</ehcache>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<databaseChangeLog
        xmlns="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog"
        xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
        xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog/dbchangelog-4.6.xsd"
        logicalFilePath="liquibase/changelog/acl-class-changelog.xml">

    <changeSet author="MariuszKumor" id="acl-class-v1">
        <createTable tableName="acl_class">
            <column name="id" type="bigint">
                <constraints nullable="false"/>
            </column>
            <column name="name" type="varchar(250)">
                <constraints nullable="false"/>
            </column>
        </createTable>

        <addPrimaryKey columnNames="id" constraintName="pk__acl_class_id" tableName="acl_class"/>
    </changeSet>

</databaseChangeLog>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<databaseChangeLog
        xmlns="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog"
        xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
        xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog/dbchangelog-4.6.xsd"
        logicalFilePath="liquibase/changelog/acl-entry-changelog.xml">

    <changeSet author="MariuszKumor" id="acl-entry-v1">
        <createTable tableName="acl_entry">
            <column name="id" type="bigint">
                <constraints nullable="false"/>
            </column>
            <column name="created_date" type="timestamp"/>
            <column name="last_modified_date" type="timestamp"/>
            <column name="created_by_id" type="bigint"/>
            <column name="last_modified_by_id" type="bigint"/>
            <column name="acl_object_identity_id" type="bigint">
                <constraints nullable="false"/>
            </column>
            <column name="acl_sid_id" type="bigint">
                <constraints nullable="false"/>
            </column>
            <column name="permission_id" type="bigint">
                <constraints nullable="false"/>
            </column>
        </createTable>

        <addPrimaryKey columnNames="id" constraintName="pk__acl_entry__id" tableName="acl_entry"/>

        <createIndex indexName="idx__acl_entry__acl_object_identity_id" tableName="acl_entry">
            <column name="acl_object_identity_id"/>
        </createIndex>

        <createIndex indexName="idx__acl_entry__acl_sid_id" tableName="acl_entry">
            <column name="acl_sid_id"/>
        </createIndex>

        <createIndex indexName="idx__acl_entry__created_by_id" tableName="acl_entry">
            <column name="created_by_id"/>
        </createIndex>

        <createIndex indexName="idx__acl_entry__permission_id" tableName="acl_entry">
            <column name="permission_id"/>
        </createIndex>

        <createIndex indexName="idx__acl_entry__last_modified_by_id" tableName="acl_entry">
            <column name="last_modified_by_id"/>
        </createIndex>

        <addForeignKeyConstraint baseColumnNames="acl_object_identity_id" baseTableName="acl_entry"
                                 constraintName="fk__acl_object_identity_id__acl_entry__acl_object_identity"
                                 deferrable="false"
                                 initiallyDeferred="false" onDelete="RESTRICT" onUpdate="RESTRICT"
                                 referencedColumnNames="id" referencedTableName="acl_object_identity"/>

        <addForeignKeyConstraint baseColumnNames="acl_sid_id" baseTableName="acl_entry"
                                 constraintName="fk__acl_sid_id__acl_entry__acl_sid" deferrable="false"
                                 initiallyDeferred="false" onDelete="RESTRICT" onUpdate="RESTRICT"
                                 referencedColumnNames="id" referencedTableName="acl_sid"/>

        <addForeignKeyConstraint baseColumnNames="created_by_id" baseTableName="acl_entry"
                                 constraintName="fk__created_by_id__acl_entry__user" deferrable="false"
                                 initiallyDeferred="false" onDelete="RESTRICT" onUpdate="RESTRICT"
                                 referencedColumnNames="id" referencedTableName="user_"/>

        <addForeignKeyConstraint baseColumnNames="permission_id" baseTableName="acl_entry"
                                 constraintName="fk__permission_id__acl_entry__permission" deferrable="false"
                                 initiallyDeferred="false" onDelete="RESTRICT" onUpdate="RESTRICT"
                                 referencedColumnNames="id" referencedTableName="permission"/>

        <addForeignKeyConstraint baseColumnNames="last_modified_by_id" baseTableName="acl_entry"
                                 constraintName="fk__last_modified_by_id__acl_entry__user" deferrable="false"
                                 initiallyDeferred="false" onDelete="RESTRICT" onUpdate="RESTRICT"
                                 referencedColumnNames="id" referencedTableName="user_"/>
    </changeSet>

</databaseChangeLog>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<databaseChangeLog
        xmlns="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog"
        xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
        xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog/dbchangelog-4.6.xsd"

    <changeSet author="MariuszKumor" id="admin-sidebar-item-v1">
        <createTable tableName="admin_sidebar_item">
            <column name="id" type="bigint">
                <constraints nullable="false"/>
            </column>
            <column name="title" type="varchar(40)">

            </column>
            <column name="angular_js_state" type="varchar(255)">
                <constraints nullable="false"/>
            </column>
            <column name="order_index" type="double">

            </column>
            <column name="icon_class" type="varchar(40)">

            <column name="last_modified_date" type="timestamp"/>
            <column name="created_by_id" type="bigint"/>

        </createTable>

        <addPrimaryKey columnNames="id" constraintName="pk__admin_sidebar_item__id" tableName="admin_sidebar_item"/>

        <createIndex indexName="idx__admin_sidebar_item__last_modified_by_id" tableName="admin_sidebar_item">
            <column name="last_modified_by_id"/>
        </createIndex>

        <createIndex indexName="idx__admin_sidebar_item__created_by_id" tableName="admin_sidebar_item">
            <column name="created_by_id"/>
        </createIndex>

        <addForeignKeyConstraint baseColumnNames="last_modified_by_id" baseTableName="admin_sidebar_item"
                                 constraintName="fk__last_modified_by_id__admin_sidebar_item__user" deferrable="false"
                                 initiallyDeferred="false" onDelete="RESTRICT" onUpdate="RESTRICT"
                                 referencedColumnNames="id" referencedTableName="user_"/>

        <addForeignKeyConstraint baseColumnNames="created_by_id" baseTableName="admin_sidebar_item"
                                 constraintName="fk__created_by_id__admin_sidebar_item__user" deferrable="false"
                                 initiallyDeferred="false" onDelete="RESTRICT" onUpdate="RESTRICT"
                                 referencedColumnNames="id" referencedTableName="user_"/>

    </changeSet>

</databaseChangeLog>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<databaseChangeLog
        xmlns="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog"
        xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
        xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog/dbchangelog-4.6.xsd"
        logicalFilePath="liquibase/changelog/comment-changelog.xml">

    <changeSet author="NaguKothapalli" id="comment-v1">
        <createTable tableName="comment">
            <column name="id" type="bigint">
                <constraints nullable="false"/>
            </column>
            <column name="message" type="varchar(1000)">
                <constraints nullable="false"/>
            </column>
            <column name="parent_id" type="bigint">
                <constraints nullable="true"/>
            </column>
            <column name="module_id" type="bigint">
                <constraints nullable="false"/>
            </column>
            <column name="created_date" type="timestamp"/>
            <column name="last_modified_date" type="timestamp"/>
            <column name="created_by_id" type="bigint"/>
            <column name="last_modified_by_id" type="bigint"/>
        </createTable>

        <addPrimaryKey columnNames="id" constraintName="pk__comment__id" tableName="comment"/>

        <createIndex indexName="idx__comment__created_by_id" tableName="comment">
            <column name="created_by_id"/>
        </createIndex>

        <createIndex indexName="idx__comment__last_modified_by_id" tableName="comment">
            <column name="last_modified_by_id"/>
        </createIndex>

        <addForeignKeyConstraint baseColumnNames="parent_id" baseTableName="comment"
                                 constraintName="fk__parent_id__comment__comment" deferrable="false"
                                 initiallyDeferred="false" onDelete="RESTRICT" onUpdate="RESTRICT"
                                 referencedColumnNames="id" referencedTableName="comment"/>

        <addForeignKeyConstraint baseColumnNames="module_id" baseTableName="comment"
                                 constraintName="fk__module_id__comment__module" deferrable="false"
                                 initiallyDeferred="false" onDelete="RESTRICT" onUpdate="RESTRICT"
                                 referencedColumnNames="id" referencedTableName="module"/>

        <addForeignKeyConstraint baseColumnNames="last_modified_by_id" baseTableName="comment"
                                 constraintName="fk__last_modified_by_id__comment__user" deferrable="false"
                                 initiallyDeferred="false" onDelete="RESTRICT" onUpdate="RESTRICT"
                                 referencedColumnNames="id" referencedTableName="user_"/>

        <addForeignKeyConstraint baseColumnNames="created_by_id" baseTableName="comment"
                                 constraintName="fk__created_by_id__comment__user" deferrable="false"
                                 initiallyDeferred="false" onDelete="RESTRICT" onUpdate="RESTRICT"
                                 referencedColumnNames="id" referencedTableName="user_"/>

    </changeSet>
</databaseChangeLog>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

        xmlns="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog"

            </column>

            </column>
            <column name="created_date" type="timestamp"/>
            <column name="last_modified_date" type="timestamp"/>
            <column name="created_by_id" type="bigint"/>
            <column name="last_modified_by_id" type="bigint"/>
        </createTable>

        <addPrimaryKey columnNames="id" constraintName="pk__comment_vote__id" tableName="comment_vote"/>

        </createIndex>

                                 constraintName="fk__comment_id__comment_vote__comment" deferrable="false"
                                 initiallyDeferred="false" onDelete="RESTRICT" onUpdate="RESTRICT"

        <addForeignKeyConstraint baseColumnNames="last_modified_by_id" baseTableName="comment_vote"
                                 constraintName="fk__last_modified_by_id__comment_vote__user" deferrable="false"
                                 initiallyDeferred="false" onDelete="RESTRICT" onUpdate="RESTRICT"
                                 referencedColumnNames="id" referencedTableName="user_"/>

        <addForeignKeyConstraint baseColumnNames="created_by_id" baseTableName="comment_vote"
                                 constraintName="fk__created_by_id__comment_vote__user" deferrable="false"
                                 initiallyDeferred="false" onDelete="RESTRICT" onUpdate="RESTRICT"
                                 referencedColumnNames="id" referencedTableName="user_"/>

    </changeSet>
</databaseChangeLog>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<databaseChangeLog
        xmlns="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog"
        xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
        xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog/dbchangelog-4.6.xsd"
        logicalFilePath="liquibase/changelog/layout-changelog.xml">

    <changeSet author="MariuszKumor" id="layout-v1">
        <createTable tableName="layout">
            <column name="id" type="bigint">
                <constraints nullable="false"/>
            </column>
            <column name="created_date" type="timestamp"/>
            <column name="last_modified_date" type="timestamp"/>
            <column name="content" type="varchar(4000)">
                <constraints nullable="false"/>
            </column>
            <column name="icon_file_name" type="varchar(100)">
                <constraints nullable="false"/>
            </column>
            <column name="title" type="varchar(40)">
                <constraints nullable="false"/>
            </column>
            <column name="created_by_id" type="bigint"/>
            <column name="last_modified_by_id" type="bigint"/>
        </createTable>

        <addPrimaryKey columnNames="id" constraintName="pk__layout__id" tableName="layout"/>

        <createIndex indexName="idx__layout__created_by_id" tableName="layout">
            <column name="created_by_id"/>
        </createIndex>

        <createIndex indexName="idx__layout__last_modified_by_id" tableName="layout">
            <column name="last_modified_by_id"/>
        </createIndex>

        <addForeignKeyConstraint baseColumnNames="created_by_id" baseTableName="layout"
                                 constraintName="fk__created_by_id__layout__user" deferrable="false"
                                 initiallyDeferred="false" onDelete="RESTRICT" onUpdate="RESTRICT"
                                 referencedColumnNames="id" referencedTableName="user_"/>


        <addForeignKeyConstraint baseColumnNames="last_modified_by_id" baseTableName="layout"
                                 constraintName="fk__last_modified_by_id__layout__user" deferrable="false"
                                 initiallyDeferred="false" onDelete="RESTRICT" onUpdate="RESTRICT"
                                 referencedColumnNames="id" referencedTableName="user_"/>

    </changeSet>

</databaseChangeLog>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<databaseChangeLog
        xmlns="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog"
        xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
        xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog/dbchangelog-4.6.xsd"
        logicalFilePath="liquibase/changelog/module-changelog.xml">

    <changeSet author="MariuszKumor" id="module-v1">
        <createTable tableName="module">
            <column name="id" type="bigint">
                <constraints nullable="false"/>
            </column>
            <column name="created_date" type="timestamp"/>
            <column name="last_modified_date" type="timestamp"/>
            <column name="column_index" type="integer">
                <constraints nullable="false"/>
            </column>
            <column name="description" type="varchar(100)"/>
            <column name="order_index" type="integer">
                <constraints nullable="false"/>
            </column>
            <column name="row_index" type="integer">
                <constraints nullable="false"/>
            </column>
            <column name="title" type="varchar(60)">
                <constraints nullable="false"/>
            </column>
            <column name="created_by_id" type="bigint"/>
            <column name="last_modified_by_id" type="bigint"/>
            <column name="module_type_id" type="bigint">
                <constraints nullable="false"/>
            </column>
            <column name="page_id" type="bigint">
                <constraints nullable="false"/>
            </column>
        </createTable>

        <addPrimaryKey columnNames="id" constraintName="pk__module__id" tableName="module"/>

        <createIndex indexName="idx__module__page_id" tableName="module">
            <column name="page_id"/>
        </createIndex>

        <createIndex indexName="idx__module__last_modified_by_id" tableName="module">
            <column name="last_modified_by_id"/>
        </createIndex>

        <createIndex indexName="idx__module__created_by_id" tableName="module">
            <column name="created_by_id"/>
        </createIndex>

        <createIndex indexName="idx__module__module_type_id" tableName="module">
            <column name="module_type_id"/>
        </createIndex>

        <addForeignKeyConstraint baseColumnNames="page_id" baseTableName="module"
                                 constraintName="fk__page_id__module__page" deferrable="false"
                                 initiallyDeferred="false" onDelete="RESTRICT" onUpdate="RESTRICT"
                                 referencedColumnNames="id" referencedTableName="page"/>

        <addForeignKeyConstraint baseColumnNames="last_modified_by_id" baseTableName="module"
                                 constraintName="fk__last_modified_by_id__module__user" deferrable="false"
                                 initiallyDeferred="false" onDelete="RESTRICT" onUpdate="RESTRICT"
                                 referencedColumnNames="id" referencedTableName="user_"/>

        <addForeignKeyConstraint baseColumnNames="created_by_id" baseTableName="module"
                                 constraintName="fk__created_by_id__module__user" deferrable="false"
                                 initiallyDeferred="false" onDelete="RESTRICT" onUpdate="RESTRICT"
                                 referencedColumnNames="id" referencedTableName="user_"/>

        <addForeignKeyConstraint baseColumnNames="module_type_id" baseTableName="module"
                                 constraintName="fk__module_type_id__module__module_type" deferrable="false"
                                 initiallyDeferred="false" onDelete="RESTRICT" onUpdate="RESTRICT"
                                 referencedColumnNames="id" referencedTableName="module_type"/>

    </changeSet>

</databaseChangeLog>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<databaseChangeLog
        xmlns="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog"
        xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
        xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog/dbchangelog-4.6.xsd"
        logicalFilePath="liquibase/changelog/admin-sidebar-item-module-type-changelog.xml">

    <changeSet author="MariuszKumor" id="module-type-admin-sidebar-item-v1">
        <createTable tableName="module_type_admin_sidebar_item">
            <column name="module_type_id" type="bigint">
                <constraints nullable="false"/>
            </column>
            <column name="admin_sidebar_item_id" type="bigint">
                <constraints nullable="false"/>
            </column>
        </createTable>

        <addPrimaryKey columnNames="module_type_id, admin_sidebar_item_id" constraintName="pk__module_type_admin_sidebar_item___module_type_id__admin_sidebar_item_id"
                       tableName="module_type_admin_sidebar_item"/>

        <createIndex indexName="idx__module_type_admin_sidebar_item__module_type_id" tableName="module_type_admin_sidebar_item">
            <column name="module_type_id"/>
        </createIndex>

        <createIndex indexName="idx__module_type_admin_sidebar_item__admin_sidebar_item_id" tableName="module_type_admin_sidebar_item">

            <column name="id" type="bigint">

        <createIndex indexName="idx__user_role__user_id" tableName="user_role">
            <column name="user_id"/>
        </createIndex>

        <createIndex indexName="idx__user_role__role_id" tableName="user_role">
            <column name="role_id"/>
        </createIndex>

        <addForeignKeyConstraint baseColumnNames="user_id" baseTableName="user_role"
                                 constraintName="fk__user_id__user_role__user" deferrable="false"
                                 initiallyDeferred="false" onDelete="RESTRICT" onUpdate="RESTRICT"
                                 referencedColumnNames="id" referencedTableName="user_"/>

        <addForeignKeyConstraint baseColumnNames="role_id" baseTableName="user_role"
                                 constraintName="fk__role_id__user_role__role" deferrable="false"
                                 initiallyDeferred="false" onDelete="RESTRICT" onUpdate="RESTRICT"
                                 referencedColumnNames="id" referencedTableName="role_"/>

    </changeSet>

</databaseChangeLog>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<databaseChangeLog
        xmlns="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog"
        xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
        xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog/dbchangelog-4.6.xsd"
        logicalFilePath="liquibase/import/import.xml">

    <property name="context" value="integration-test" context="integrationTest"/>
    <property name="context" value="prod" context="prod"/>

    <changeSet author="MariuszKumor" id="import-v1" runAlways="false" runOnChange="true">

        <preConditions onFail="HALT">
            <sqlCheck expectedResult="0">SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_</sqlCheck>
            <sqlCheck expectedResult="0">SELECT COUNT(*) FROM role_</sqlCheck>
            <sqlCheck expectedResult="0">SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_role</sqlCheck>
            <sqlCheck expectedResult="0">SELECT COUNT(*) FROM acl_class</sqlCheck>
            <sqlCheck expectedResult="0">SELECT COUNT(*) FROM permission_acl_class_category</sqlCheck>
            <sqlCheck expectedResult="0">SELECT COUNT(*) FROM permission_general_category</sqlCheck>
            <sqlCheck expectedResult="0">SELECT COUNT(*) FROM permission</sqlCheck>
            <sqlCheck expectedResult="0">SELECT COUNT(*) FROM role_permission</sqlCheck>
            <sqlCheck expectedResult="0">SELECT COUNT(*) FROM acl_sid</sqlCheck>
            <sqlCheck expectedResult="0">SELECT COUNT(*) FROM acl_object_identity</sqlCheck>
            <sqlCheck expectedResult="0">SELECT COUNT(*) FROM acl_entry</sqlCheck>
            <sqlCheck expectedResult="0">SELECT COUNT(*) FROM module_type</sqlCheck>
            <sqlCheck expectedResult="0">SELECT COUNT(*) FROM resource</sqlCheck>
            <sqlCheck expectedResult="0">SELECT COUNT(*) FROM layout</sqlCheck>
            <sqlCheck expectedResult="0">SELECT COUNT(*) FROM page</sqlCheck>
            <sqlCheck expectedResult="0">SELECT COUNT(*) FROM module</sqlCheck>
            <sqlCheck expectedResult="0">SELECT COUNT(*) FROM comment</sqlCheck>
            <sqlCheck expectedResult="0">SELECT COUNT(*) FROM comment_vote</sqlCheck>
            <sqlCheck expectedResult="0">SELECT COUNT(*) FROM admin_sidebar_item</sqlCheck>
            <sqlCheck expectedResult="0">SELECT COUNT(*) FROM module_type_admin_sidebar_item</sqlCheck>
        </preConditions>

        <loadData file="liquibase/import/${context}/user-data.csv"
                  separator=";"
                  tableName="user_">
        </loadData>

        <loadData file="liquibase/import/${context}/role-data.csv"
                  separator=";"
                  tableName="role_">
        </loadData>

        <loadData file="liquibase/import/${context}/user-role-data.csv"
                  separator=";"
                  tableName="user_role">
        </loadData>

        <loadData file="liquibase/import/${context}/acl-class-data.csv"
                  separator=";"
                  tableName="acl_class">
        </loadData>

        <loadData file="liquibase/import/${context}/permission-acl-class-category-data.csv"
                  separator=";"
                  tableName="permission_acl_class_category">
        </loadData>

        <loadData file="liquibase/import/${context}/permission-general-category-data.csv"
                  separator=";"
                  tableName="permission_general_category">
        </loadData>

        <loadData file="liquibase/import/${context}/permission-data.csv"
                  separator=";"
                  tableName="permission">
        </loadData>

        <loadData file="liquibase/import/${context}/role-permission-data.csv"
                  separator=";"
                  tableName="role_permission">
        </loadData>

        <loadData file="liquibase/import/${context}/acl-sid-data.csv"
                  separator=";"
                  tableName="acl_sid">
        </loadData>

        <loadData file="liquibase/import/${context}/acl-object-identity-data.csv"
                  separator=";"
                  tableName="acl_object_identity">
        </loadData>

        <loadData file="liquibase/import/${context}/acl-entry-data.csv"
                  separator=";"
                  tableName="acl_entry">
        </loadData>

        <loadData file="liquibase/import/${context}/module-type-data.csv"
                  separator=";"
                  tableName="module_type">
        </loadData>

        <loadData file="liquibase/import/${context}/resource-data.csv"
                  separator=";"
                  tableName="resource">
        </loadData>

        <loadData file="liquibase/import/${context}/layout-data.csv"
                  separator=";"
                  tableName="layout">
        </loadData>

        <loadData file="liquibase/import/${context}/page-data.csv"
                  separator=";"
                  tableName="page">
        </loadData>

        <loadData file="liquibase/import/${context}/module-data.csv"
                  separator=";"

        </loadData>

        <loadData file="liquibase/import/${context}/module-type-admin-sidebar-item-changelog.csv"

    </changeSet>
</databaseChangeLog>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<databaseChangeLog
        xmlns="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog"
        xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
        xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog/dbchangelog-4.6.xsd"
        logicalFilePath="liquibase/master-changelog.xml">

    <include file="liquibase/changelog/changelog.xml" />
    <include file="liquibase/import/import.xml" />
</databaseChangeLog>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<Configuration status="info" name="XMLConfigTest" packages="org.apache.logging.log4j.test">
    <Properties>
        <Property name="pattern">%d{yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss SSS} [%p] [c=%c{1}] %m%n</Property>
    </Properties>

    <Appenders>
        <Console name="STDOUT">
            <PatternLayout>
                <pattern>${pattern}</pattern>
            </PatternLayout>
        </Console>
        <File name="File" fileName="abixen-platform-core.log">
            <PatternLayout>
                <pattern>${pattern}</pattern>
            </PatternLayout>
        </File>
    </Appenders>

    <Loggers>
        <Logger name="com.abixen.platform.core" level="debug" additivity="false">
            <AppenderRef ref="STDOUT"/>
        </Logger>

        <Logger name="org.hibernate" level="warn" additivity="false">
            <AppenderRef ref="File">
            </AppenderRef>
            <AppenderRef ref="STDOUT" level="warn"/>
        </Logger>

        <Logger name="org.springframework" level="warn" additivity="false">
            <AppenderRef ref="File">
            </AppenderRef>
            <AppenderRef ref="STDOUT" level="warn"/>
        </Logger>

        <Root level="info">
            <AppenderRef ref="STDOUT"/>
        </Root>
    </Loggers>

</Configuration>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<configuration>
  <appender name="stash" class="net.logstash.logback.appender.LogstashAccessTcpSocketAppender">
      <destination>logstash:4560</destination>

      <!-- encoder is required -->
      <encoder class="net.logstash.logback.encoder.LogstashAccessEncoder" />
  </appender>

  <appender-ref ref="stash" />
</configuration>
